thread.title: Carnival faces PR headache after cruise brawl

title: Carnival faces PR headache after cruise brawl
text:
Carnival faces PR headache after cruise brawl 1:52pm GMT - 01:20 
Carnival has launched an investigation into a wild brawl off the Australian coast, that saw 23 passengers kicked off a cruise. Some on board accuse security of being heavy handed. Joel Labi reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Carnival has launched an investigation into a wild brawl off the Australian coast, that saw 23 passengers kicked off a cruise. Some on board accuse security of being heavy handed.
